backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing documents with add, remove, get, and filter operations, storing metadata and blob references with authentication checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence mapping showing which frontend files implement specific feature requests and related components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, document features, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH theme variables and dark mode tokens applied to base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root mount node and script loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router setup with authenticated layout and routes for list, upload, and detail pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication wrapper that prompts for Internet Identity login before showing protected content.
frontend/src/components/documents/Docume: Per-document action menu enabling viewing, downloading, and deleting documents with confirmation dialog.
UI component providing search, category, office, direction, and date filters for documents, with logic to reset and validate selections.
Renders a paginated table of documents with metadata, icons, and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/components/documents/EmptyS: Displays an empty state illustration and button to upload a document when no documents exist.
App layout with navigation, theme toggle, identity menu, and header branding.
frontend/src/features/documents/useDelet: React Query mutation hook to delete a document and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/features/documents/useDocum: Fetches a single document by ID using the actor and React Query.
Fetches and clientâ€‘filters a list of documents with pagination and query parameters.
frontend/src/features/documents/useUploa: Handles uploading a document, converting file data to base64, sending metadata, and tracking progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context, provider, and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers with light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/src/lib/categoryHelpers.ts: Maps Category enums to display labels and provides selectable category option lists.
frontend/src/lib/officeHelpers.ts: Converts office enums and strings to readable labels and Office objects.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for class merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the App.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentDetailPage.ts: Displays detailed document info with preview, metadata, and actions.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentListPage.tsx: Shows searchable, filterable document list with pagination support.
frontend/src/pages/UploadDocumentPage.ts: Form page for uploading documents with validation, progress, and success handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Tracks project state including UI update requirements, existing features, and pending feature requests for header styling, category-based filtering, and a new table column.
